trans-unit.source: Used to group collections of controls.
trans-unit.target: 用來群組控制項的集合。

trans-unit.source: A Panel is a control that contains other controls.
trans-unit.target: 面板是包含其他控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use a Panel to group collections of controls such as a group of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用群組集合，例如群組控制項的面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: As with other container controls such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control, if the Panel control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property is set to `false`, the controls contained within the Panel will also be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如同其他容器控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>控制，如果 Panel 控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>屬性設定為`false`，面板中所包含的控制項也會停用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: The Panel control is displayed by default without any borders.
trans-unit.target: Panel 控制項都會依預設不會產生框線。

trans-unit.source: You can provide a standard or three-dimensional border using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.BorderStyle%2A> property to distinguish the area of the panel from other areas on the form.
trans-unit.target: 您可以提供一般或&3;d 框線使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.BorderStyle%2A>屬性來區別在表單上的其他區域面板的區域。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because the Panel control derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property to enable scroll bars in the Panel control.
trans-unit.target: 因為面板控制項衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>類別，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>屬性來啟用面板控制項中的捲軸。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, any controls located within the Panel (but outside of its visible region), can be scrolled to with the scroll bars provided.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>屬性設定為`true`，找出面板中 （但其可見區域外），任何控制項可以捲動到具有所提供的捲軸。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Panel control does not display a caption.
trans-unit.target: Panel 控制項不會顯示標題。

trans-unit.source: If you need a control similar to a Panel that can display a caption, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要控制項可以顯示標題面板類似，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Panel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Panel"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control resizes based on its contents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否調整大小會根據其內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control automatically resizes based on its contents; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果自動調整控制項，根據其內容。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.AutoSize*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.AutoSize*>屬性已變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the automatic sizing behavior of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控制項的自動調整大小行為。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 時設定這個屬性不是有效的指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the border style for the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控制項的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control is displayed without a border.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>沒有框線顯示控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to distinguish the boundaries of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control from other areas on the form.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來區別界限<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>其他區域在表單上的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_BorderStyle.None" name="BorderStyle.None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_BorderStyle.None" name="BorderStyle.None" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 時設定這個屬性不是有效的指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制代碼時，取得必要的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref>包含必要的建立參數時在建立控制項之控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Fires the event indicating that the panel has been resized.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件指出已調整面板大小。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting controls should use this in favor of actually listening to the event, but should still call <xref uid="langword_csharp_base.onResize" name="base.onResize" href=""></xref> to ensure that the event is fired for external listeners.
trans-unit.target: 繼承的控制項應該使用此改用實際接聽事件，但仍應該呼叫<xref uid="langword_csharp_base.onResize" name="base.onResize" href=""></xref>以確保外部接聽程式會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to this control using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以使用 TAB 鍵這個控制項提供焦點。

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按下 TAB 鍵時，則會將輸入的焦點設定為定位順序中的下一個控制項。

trans-unit.source: Controls with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property value of `false` are not included in the collection of controls in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 控制與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>屬性值為`false`未被納入的定位順序中的控制項集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: The tab order can be manipulated by setting the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 定位順序都可以藉由設定控制項的操作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The TabStop property has no effect on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control as it is a container object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > TabStop 屬性沒有任何作用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制，因為它是容器物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can give the focus to the control using the TAB key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者可以將焦點置於控制項中使用 TAB 鍵;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 與這個控制項相關聯的文字。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員不是此控制項有意義的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation for this control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個控制項的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representation of the control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>控制項表示法。</xref:System.String>
